meanings.definition: A title for a Muslim ruler or leader.
meanings.sent1: The abbas was respected by all in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The abbas led the prayers at the mosque.
meanings.sent3: The abbas accidentally tripped over his robe during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom and guidance made him the abbas of the community.
meanings.sent5: The golden crown on the abbas's head gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: My friend's last name is Abbas.
meanings.sent2: Abbas is a common surname in many Arabic-speaking countries.
meanings.sent3: When Mr. Abbas walked into the room, everyone greeted him warmly.
meanings.sent4: The Abbas family has a long history of tradition and honor.
meanings.sent5: The name Abbas means 'lion' in Arabic.

meanings.sent1: Abbas is a popular name for boys in some cultures.
meanings.sent2: I have a cousin named Abbas.
meanings.sent3: Abbas always has a smile on his face, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent4: When Abbas sings, it feels like the birds are joining in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The name Abbas carries a sense of strength and kindness.
